pokedex.name: Bulbasaur
pokedex.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokemon.

pokedex.name: Charmander
pokedex.description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

pokedex.name: Squirtle
pokedex.description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

pokedex.name: Charizard
pokedex.description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

pokedex.name: Dragonite
pokedex.description: It is said to make its home somewhere in the sea. It guides crews of shipwrecks to shore.

pokedex.name: Charmeleon
pokedex.description: In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.
